title: MBP 13 2010 run slowly
message:
Passed Asd and shows mpc error like attached file.
Need mpc replacement?

title: MBP 13 2010 run slowly
message: Continue on error to check for more failing sensors.

title: MBP 13 2010 run slowly
message:
No Title

Yes, one more error. I tried another hdd and usb hdd. Same problem.

title: MBP 13 2010 run slowly
message: Check R5235/36 and R5260/61. If those are ok then it is most likely the MCP or SMC.

title: MBP 13 2010 run slowly
message:
Battery appears like x. But if I removed it, it is still on.
You suspect ancient for first or second error?

title: MBP 13 2010 run slowly
message: Bad SMC I think. If PPBUS is 12.3V then replace SMC.

title: MBP 13 2010 run slowly
message:
Yes, it is12.26V

But TN1D is SMC error or MCP error? Or could be both?

title: MBP 13 2010 run slowly
message: SMC I/O means it can't communicate with the SMC on that line. Most likely SMC. Given the evidence that PPBUS_G3H is 12.23v, bad SMC.
